rules.name: myRule_19
rules.label: Service Address Change or SA Account Missing?

rules.name: myRule_26
rules.label: Is asset related to a fiber sytem?

Flow.description: Actions to be performed on Asset record creation or update / Case #49928 MAC Address Entry

value.stringValue: LEFT([Asset].MAC_Address__c, 2) & ":" & MID([Asset].MAC_Address__c, 3, 2) & ":" & MID([Asset].MAC_Address__c, 5, 2) & ":" & MID([Asset].MAC_Address__c, 7, 2) & ":" & MID([Asset].MAC_Address__c, 9, 2) & ":" & RIGHT([Asset].MAC_Address__c, 2)

Flow.label: Asset - Record Changes
